data.title: Cyprus demographics 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise demographics of Cyprus by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text: There are 635k males and 633k females in Cyprus. The percentage of the male population is 50.09%, compared to 49.91% of the female population. Cyprus has 2,263 more males than females. The sex ratio in Cyprus in 2024 will be 100.357 males per 100 females. Cyprus is in the 158th position in terms of the female-to-male ratio.
